text:
If you have ESU licenses, these should give you rights to install the updates. 
Remember it's like Win 7 ESU, no esu key, all you will get is a failed update. 
If you do not have the budget for esu's tuck those babies behind protection
while you evaluate your options including migration, restrictions and even the
use
of https://blog.0patch.com/2023/08/three-more-years-of-critical-security.html

%40e4f6628d.com

metadata.topic: Windows Server 2012 r2 Update Sync in WSUS
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Windows Server 2012 r2 Update Sync in WSUS
metadata.email_text_original:
If you have ESU licenses, these should give you rights to install the updates. 
Remember it's like Win 7 ESU, no esu key, all you will get is a failed update. 
If you do not have the budget for esu's tuck those babies behind protection
while you evaluate your options including migration, restrictions and even the
use
of https://blog.0patch.com/2023/08/three-more-years-of-critical-security.html
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.0patch.com%2F2023%2F08%2Fthree-more-years-of-critical-security.html&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C4bf23543b04d43ef0bbf08dc0d45baaa%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638399840347877028%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=f441T%2FGvpCjP%2BcnmKrufF6AQMGZIvlQMTJH9aFM1%2FNI%3D&reserved=0]
